episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc's bento features chicken wings braised in a sweet and savory sauce. Maki brings you a bento of meat-stuffed mushrooms. And from Lyon, France, a one-of-a-kind bento full of local specialties.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-10 Braised Chicken Wing Bento & Stuffed Mushroom Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc makes chicken tender rolls with two Japanese stuffings, while Maki wraps her meat rolls with nori! Bento Topics introduces a temple famous for its Zen Buddhist cuisine, including a vegan burger.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-11 Chicken Tender Rolls Bento & Norimaki Meat Roll Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, a dry version of everyone's favorite nikujaga. Maki uses corn kernels and edamame to wrap shumai. And from London, a bento maker whose popularity is symbolic of the rise in vegan cuisine.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-12 Dry Nikujaga Bento & Colorful Shumai Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc sautes shrimp with butter-soy sauce while Maki cooks up some delicious shrimp cakes. Bento Topics takes you to Shizuoka for a taste of two local specialities, wasabi and wasabi-fed shamo chicken!
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-13 Butter-Soy Sauce Shrimp Bento & Ebi Katsu (a cutlet made from minced shrimp) Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Mark's bento features sweet and savory steak on rice. Maki uses crabsticks to make a Chinese omelet. Bento Topics takes you to New York City, where teriyaki and bento have become all the rage.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-14 Steak Gyudon Bento & Kanitama(crab and egg)-don Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Two chicken bentos! From Maki, Miso Tsukune, and from Marc, Banbanji with sesame dressing. Bento Topics features Kyoto's tasty heritage vegetables and pickles that have inspired a mock-sushi bento.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-15 Banbanji Bento & Miso Tsukune Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, a Teriyaki Hamburg bento, and from Maki, Chirashi-zushi. Bento Topics features two Balinese favorites: spicy pork satay, and a dish called babi guling that features a spit-roasted pig.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-16 Teriyaki Hamburg Bento & Chirashi-zushi Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc brings you an all-time favorite-salmon teriyaki. Maki cooks up a delicious apricot butter chicken bento. And on Bento Topics, Hiroshima's famous oysters packed in an auspicious bento box.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-17 Salmon Teriyaki Bento & Apricot Butter Chicken Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, a bento of braised pork belly on rice, and from Maki, eggplant meat rolls. On Bento Topics, Hong Kong's fragrant lap cheong sausages provide a perfect accent to rice and taro cakes.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-18 Buta-don Bento & Nasu Meat Roll Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, crispy fried tofu in a sweet ginger glaze, and from Maki, sweet and sour meatballs. And from Tottori, Japan, famous for its sand dunes, a bento featuring another Tottori specialty, crabs.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-19 Crispy Tofu Bento & Sweet and Sour Meatball Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: It's spring! Marc celebrates with a fruity sandwich and Maki, colorful fritters. And from Taiwan's food capital, Tainan, a traditional breakfast and cute bento featuring the ubiquitous milkfish.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-20 Fruit Sando Bento & Hanami Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, a crispy chicken cutlet with creamy egg sauce. Meanwhile, Maki makes a finger food version of Omurice. Bento Topics features the food culture of Japan's popular island resort, Okinawa.
episodes.subtitle: Season 6-1 Chicken Katsudon Bento & Maki-maki Omurice Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: From Marc, toasted shiitake stuffed with rice and glazed with miso butter. Maki uses crab sticks to make quick and easy cream croquettes. Bento Topics showcases a yummy bento from the Philippines.
episodes.subtitle: Season 6-2 Shiitake Yaki-onigiri Bento & Kani Cream Korokke Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc grills lamb and veggies in a fragrant curry sauce. Maki glazes chicken with a clear sweet and sour sauce. Bento Topics features Okayama's famous bara-zushi bento, eaten on festive occasions.
episodes.subtitle: Season 6-3 Lamb chop Bento & Tangy Chicken Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Marc's bento features sweet and savory Yaki-udon noodles. Maki makes rice croquettes filled with cheese for her Rice Korokke bento. Bento Topics features Poland's favorite dish, pierogi dumplings.
episodes.subtitle: Season 6-4 Yaki-udon Bento & Rice Korokke Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO
